posts.post_content:
I have a beautiful SGC 45 Pelty Uzit available for sale. This combination is very difficult. Only two cards are graded by SGC and none by PSA. Card is Sold. Check or MO.

Please let me know if you have any questions [url]mmw2161@aol.com[/url]

Thanks,

Jerry
Wow, nice card Jerry! Tough common too....
